review.body: Layer 1 artifacts look comprehensive and well-structured. All contextual sections properly address the business requirements. Approved for merge.

pull_request.title: [POL-2025-001] Layer 1: Contextual
pull_request.body:
## SABSA Artifact: Contextual Layer

**Policy ID:** POL-2025-001
**Layer:** 1 of 6 — Contextual
**Generated:** 2025-01-15T11:00:00Z
**Status:** complete

---

### Policy Summary

> This policy mandates comprehensive encryption for customer personally identifiable information (PII). Key requirements include AES-256 encryption at rest, TLS 1.2+ in transit, HSM-based key storage, 90-day key rotation, MFA for key access, and complete audit logging. The policy supports SOC 2 and GDPR compliance obligations.
